#drupal-modal .form-text,
#drupal-modal .form-email,
#drupal-modal .form-select {
  padding: 0.5rem !important;
  width: 100% !important;
  font-size: 1rem !important;
  height: auto !important; }
#drupal-modal .form-submit {
  margin-top: 0.5rem;
  margin-left: 0rem; }
#drupal-modal .js-form-type-radio,
#drupal-modal .js-form-type-checkbox {
  padding-bottom: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0; }
  #drupal-modal .js-form-type-radio label,
  #drupal-modal .js-form-type-checkbox label {
    padding-bottom: 0;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    padding-left: 1rem;
    padding-right: 2rem; }
#drupal-modal fieldset {
  padding: 0.5rem !important;
  margin-top: 35px; }
  #drupal-modal fieldset.no-legend {
    margin-top: 0px; }
  #drupal-modal fieldset legend {
    border: 0px;
    position: absolute;
    top: -49px;
    background: transparent;
    float: none;
    left: 0;
    padding-left: 0;
    font-weight: 400; }
    #drupal-modal fieldset legend span {
      font-size: 1.1rem; }
